document_data.name: Morkoth
document_data.mainbody: The '''Morkoth language''' was the racial language of [[morkoth]]s, a strange race of undersea [[aberration]]s.<ref>{{ Cite book/Monstrous Manual|258}}
document_data.Speakers: Some of the individual [[specialty priest]]s of aquatic deities were known to learn various other aquatic languages, such as Morkoth. These included the [[sea druid]]s of [[Deep Sashelas]], the [[waveservant]]s of [[Umberlee]], and the [[waterwalker]]s of [[Istishia]].
